name: The Tale of the Lone Dwarf
name_original: The Tale of the Lone Dwarf
description:
Tales of a Lonely Dwarf is a minimalist action role-playing game that has a dwarf on a journey around the world as its protagonist.

The game will feature real-time combat, melee attacks, and magic attacks.

It will be possible to evolve the character by collecting orbs and improving the melee weapon.

I'm in the early stages of the game and I still have a long way to go, I have a lot of ideas to put into practice. All help and feedback is welcome.

Thank you all.
